armourer.desc: Here you can craft armor, repair damaged equipment, dismantle equipment for parts or remove upgrades from sockets.

banditcamp.label: Bandit Camp
banditcamp.desc: A group of dangerous bandits have made camp here.

barber.label: Barber
barber.desc: Visit barbers for a shave or a new haircut.

hansebase.label: Hanse Base
hansebase.desc: Expect to run into armed-to-the-teeth bandits here.

blacksmith.desc: Here you can craft weapons, repair damaged equipment, dismantle equipment for parts or remove upgrades from sockets.

kid.label: Knight Errant in Distress
kid.desc: Here you can help a knight errant fight bandits.

label.steelsilvergauntlets: steel sword, silver sword and gauntlets
label.all: steel sword, silver sword, gauntlets, armor, trousers and boots
label.aftercleared: accessible after the area is cleared

desc.trousersboots: located in a cheast, ontop of the broken bridge
desc.all: The Key for the Portal is jsut outside the Cave. The are all Wolven Digramms inside, three on two locations inside the cave
desc.armor: the Diagram is inside the House, behind a Picurefarm on the Wall
desc.silverarmortrousers: Located behind a Illustion. In the next Room find the Crystal and use it on the Door, use Aard to activate the Portal. After the Portal there are the three Diagrams.

label.gwenttournment: Gwent: To Everything - Turn, Turn, Tournamenet!
label.bigfeet: Big Feet to Fill: The FIrst Group
label.granite: Goodness, Gracious, Great Balls of Granite!
label.smittenkight: The Warble of a Smitten Knight
label.bigfleet: Big Feet to Fill: The Fith Group
label.enjpytheplay: But Other than that, how did you enjoy the play?

signalfire.label: Signal Fire
signalfire.desc: If a signal fire is lit by a torch runner, reinforcements will arrive to help the bandits in their fight.

desc.montcranecastle: Duke Roger the Reveler was, as his nickname might suggest, no teetotaler. The story of his alcohol-fueled romps number today amoung the most cherished of traditional Toussaint tales. This state of perpetual tipsiness might just be what drove his decision to surround the duchy with a series of castles, meant to protect Toussaint from the barbarous highlanders of Mount Gorgon. Thing is, no one has ever heard of such a folk.
